executive_summary: Bicycle manufacturers make new bikes and parts for upgrades and repairs. Demand primarily stems from disposable income and consumer spending. While economic conditions soured during the pandemic, stay-at-home orders and lockdown restrictions supported biking activity, leading to robust growth in 2021. Exercise trends created significant opportunities for bicycle manufacturers during the period. Even so, demand has faltered as employees returned to work; many consumers have prioritized other leisure and entertainment options, stifling demand for new bikes and parts. Overall, revenue climbed at an expected CAGR of 0.8% to $1.1 billion through the current period, despite a 1.1% drop in 2024, where profit settled at 3.6%.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: The pandemic supported demand for bikes
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Government-mandated lockdown restrictions severely limited entertainment, travel and leisure opportunities for most households and individuals, stimulating demand for new bikes, especially in 2021.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: High oil prices encouraged consumers to bike
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Elevated crude oil prices directly translated to higher gas prices, making it more expensive to operate passenger vehicles.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Foreign competitors have overwhelmed the domestic industry
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Domestic bicycle manufacturers have historically faced intense competition from foreign producers.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Bicycle manufacturers struggle to attract non-core demographics
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Manufacturers have struggled to permeate other major demographics, like single adults.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Electric bikes continue to grow in popularity
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Electric bikes have emerged as a viable alternative to cars.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Health consciousness will create demand for biking
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: This trend will encourage many individuals to adopt more active, healthier lifestyles.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Improving economic conditions will support sales
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Stronger economic conditions will encourage consumers to purchase new bikes.

industry_definition: This industry primarily manufactures non-motorized bicycles. Buyers regularly use these products for transportation, leisure travel, sport and competitive racing.
key_trends: Bicycle manufacturers compete on price, quality and safety.
High import penetration has plagued the industry.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Mass merchants include Target, Walmart, Costco and Amazon.
Smaller, niche manufacturers often thrive through sales to specialty stores.

tier_2_suppliers: Rubber Product Manufacturing in the US
Metal Stamping & Forging in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_description: More people rode bikes amid lockdowns.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Increased Demand Has Benefited Parts Manufacturing
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Bike manufacturers often sell parts to other manufacturers.

international_trade_points.trade_title: Subdued trade markets have stifled imports
international_trade_points.trade_description: Foreign companies have reported weak trade markets.
Foreign manufacturers dominate the domestic market.

business_locations.location_description: The West contains many large, affluent cities that command a significant portion of demand.
The Great Lakes region is the most prominent manufacturing hub.

regulations_points.regulation_description: The CPSC sets minimum safety and manufacturing standards.

concentration_points.concentration_description: Smaller manufacturers collectively have a leading share.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: Bicycle manufacturers rely on skilled workers.

FAQs.question: How is your company affected by rising imports?
